channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: These Frogs Don’t Just Survive Venomous Murder Hornets—They Devour Them
item.description: It's just like grandpa used to say: It's a frog-eat-murder-hornet world out there.

item.title: Telstra’s revised NBN plan pricing is a welcome change – but I’d still consider these 4 better-value providers first
item.description: Telstra, Australia's largest telecommunications provider, recently dropped the cost of its NBN plans – but there's still much better value to be found if you know where to look.

item.title: New unicorn Brevo raises $583M to challenge CRM giants
item.description: Brevo, a customer relationship management company headquartered in Paris, is now a unicorn.

item.title: Sorry Apple, but I don’t think iOS 26 is fit for purpose
item.description: Bugs, slowdown, battery drain – I don't think iOS 26 is Apple at its finest.
